short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance the live streaming experience on YouTube by providing real-time translation of chat messages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make YouTube live streams more fun and accessible with real-time chat translations! This extension translates chat messages instantly, helping you connect with people from all over the world. Supports 139 languages, so you never miss out on the conversation. Perfect for viewers and streamers who love a diverse audience!
